text: Saleh al-Arouri (, also transliterated as Salah al-Arouri or Salih al-Aruri; 19 August 1966 â€“ 2 January 2024) was a senior leader of Hamas, and a founding commander of its military wing, the Izz ad-Din al-Qassam Brigades, at the time of his death. He lived in Lebanon. On 2 January 2024, al-Arouri was killed in Dahieh, suburban Beirut, in a missile attack by the Israel Defense Forces. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Palestinian militants Category:Hamas Category:Palestinian politicians Category:Hamas people Category:Extrajudicial killings by the Israeli military
title: Saleh al-Arouri
